review: I bought the FireTV and FireTV stick as soon as they came out.  The FireTV is fast, fluid and surprisingly refined.  The FireTV stick, on th other hand, is the FireTV's slow-witted brother after the horse kicked it in the head.  It's slow, jerky and mine were plagued with wireless disconnect issues.  (Tested 2 different sticks, 2.4 and 5 GHz with 4 different APs from 4 different manufacturers and various settings with AP is less than 10 ft away through drywall with wood studs.  A Roku 3 in the same spot is flawless.).Combine all that with the cheap remote (without voice search) and this isn't worth the savings over the full FireTV.
